translation.ko: 희망이자 가능성이죠 꿈을 실현할 수 있는 기회예요

translation.en: Time and time again, what I've seen with these children is,
translation.ko: 이 아이들을 보며 몇 번이고 깨닫게 되는 건 아주 간단한 사실입니다

translation.en: it's the simplest thing, like, just giving them a safe space to play.
translation.ko: 몇 번이고 깨닫게 되는 건 아주 간단한 사실입니다 안전한 놀이 공간이 있어야 한다는 거죠

translation.en: A safe place to engage their imaginations, to give them a chance.
translation.ko: 상상력을 발휘하고 다른 삶을 살 기회를 줄 안전한 장소요

translation.en: It's so simple.
And yet it goes so deep.
And there we were an hour ago, on the train tracks,
translation.ko: 한 시간 전에 본 건 선로에서 쓰레기를 줍는

translation.en: seeing Dulaly on the tracks picking up rubbish.
translation.ko: 한 시간 전에 본 건 선로에서 쓰레기를 줍는 둘랄리의 모습이었죠

translation.en: It's so nice to see this new face and happy face here in the class.
translation.ko: 그러다 수업을 받고 있는 행복한 표정을 보니 좋네요

translation.en: Here she's in a safe environment, getting an education for the rest of her life.
translation.ko: 안전한 환경에서 앞으로의 인생을 위한 교육을 받는 거예요

translation.en: And her hopes are to become a doctor. How cool is that?
translation.ko: 둘랄리는 의사가 되는 게 꿈이래요 정말 멋지죠?

translation.en: [Orlando] Everybody's idea of an education is different.
But whether it's a tarp that's laid down on the floor
in the terminal of the shipyard
or that's set up in the slums...
translation.ko: 방수포 위든 빈민가에 세운 교실이든 간에

translation.en: something that creates community, that creates a safe space
for children to come to, that's a future.
It's a step towards a future.
[Orlando] I'm going to try doing that dance move.
How was I?
[Edouard] When you see a statistic, actually, one million, it's a lot.
translation.ko: 통계 수치만 봐도 사실 100만은 엄청나게 큰 숫자죠

translation.en: But it is important to understand
what does it mean behind, for one person.
And the photograph is about capturing that.
translation.ko: 사진으로 그런 걸 포착할 수 있죠

translation.en: Not only to capture but as well to be then shared
with people and touch other people's hearts.
And I think this is what is very important.
To be able to take a photo of this lovely, happy face here...
translation.ko: 이 사랑스럽고 행복한 표정을 사진에 담을 수 있어 좋네요

translation.en: She, um... She represents a big population here of kids that, um...
translation.ko: 얘가 대변하는 건 여기서 도움을 기다리고 있는

translation.en: that all need help, they all need more.
translation.ko: 많은 아이죠 더 많은 도움이 필요해요

translation.en: And these photographs are hopefully going to end up on billboards and posters
translation.ko: 그리고 이 사진들이 부디 전 세계의 광고판과 포스터 및 SNS에 걸리길 바라요

translation.en: and social media all around the world.
translation.ko: 광고판과 포스터 및 SNS에 걸리길 바라요

translation.en: And people can see and be emotionally affected
translation.ko: 사람들이 그걸 보고 마음에 뭔가를 느껴

translation.en: and change to help make change and give.
translation.ko: 도움의 손길을 뻗으며 얘들에게 진짜 필요한 걸 줘야죠

translation.en: That's what these guys really need. We need so much more here.
translation.ko: 지금보다 훨씬 더 많은 도움이 필요하거든요

translation.en: We need to make a change. It's...it's important.
And, hopefully, my photos can help make that change.
translation.ko: 제 사진이 그런 변화에 쓰이길 바라요

translation.en: How can it not? [laughs]
